name: zflow
description: A professional, self-hosted workflow automation platform.

scripts.db:migrate: cd primary-backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:seed: cd primary-backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.db:generate: pnpm recursive exec npx prisma generate
scripts.dev: npx concurrently -n "BACKEND,HOOKS,PROC,WORKER,FRONT" -c "bgBlue,bgGreen,bgMagenta,bgCyan,bgYellow" "pnpm dev:backend" "pnpm dev:hooks" "pnpm dev:processor" "pnpm dev:worker" "pnpm dev:frontend"
